Name: Orb Tour
About the game: Do you like open sandbox platformers? Do you like riding dragons, climbing towers, solving riddles, piloting flying saucers, finding collectibles, robots, exploring the vast reaches of space, medieval times, wintery wonderlands, dreamscapes, and more? Well then, our latest and greatest game ORB TOUR is for you. Snowy the snowcone is an alien who has been asleep for many years. When he wakes up, his people have VANISHED! He is the last of his kind, and he needs your help to find all 30 of the missing power orbs, so he can rebuild the mothership and bring his people back, before they face extinction. Noteworthy features: Save Stating in Level (not for hard mode) Custom Camera Zooming Advanced Jump Controls Gamepad Supported (Xbox recommended) Unlockable Hard Mode (after you beat the game the first time, no save stating in hard mode) Coin rush mode (for speedrunners)
